resources.string: Please complete a short survey. You will be asked whether you have any new symptoms. Please select YES or NO for each of the symptoms.
A NEW cough, runny nose, sore throat, fever, shaking chills, muscle aches or recent diarrhea? Yes or No
2. A NEW cough, or cough now producing sputum/mucus, new wheezing or new shortness of breath? Yes or No
3. NEW generalized weakness, lightheadedness or dizziness? Yes or No
4. NEW shortness of breath at rest, on exertion or when lying flat, new shortness of breath that awakens you from sleep or new swelling in your feet or legs? Yes or No
Check each symptom that is NEW:
